channel.title: 317 delta help
channel.description:
Hey, I need help with my 317 delta server.. a couple things:
[ul][li]Firemaking (No no-clip, actual fire appear, and the player making the fire moves)[/li] [li]Full crafting (Leather, snake, dragon hides, gems, glass, etc.)[/li] [li]Slayer (Master, working gems, working monster equipment, etc.)[/li] [li]Runecrafting (all runes & multirunes)[/li] [li]Agility (Gnome agility)[/li] [li]Barrows Effects[/li] [li]Help me find a client that's already coded for these things[/li] [li]Moving NPCs (That won't no-clip)[/li][/ul]
Might be more, if anyone (maybe a developer) could help, that would be lovely.

item.title: 317 delta help
item.dc:creator: @DaGleesh DaGleesh
item.description:
@DaGleesh wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:543661”][quote author=vincentvodb link=topic=662542.msg4428290#msg4428290 date=1401911634]
If you can’t code this yourself, search for a coder cause these are basic things.
Or search for a full working source.
[/quote]

It would be more beneficial for him to learn how, by breaking big ideas into small ideas.[/quote]

Thank both of you, I’m in my files now. I think it would be better for me to learn also.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 delta help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Do you know how to program? Do you know how to break down an abstract idea into a set of smaller components?

For example, for the firemaking question. What you need to do is

  1. Start firemaking
  2. Make the fire
  3. Move the player

Which can be broken down into

  1. Check if the player has logs and a tinderbox
  2. If so, drop logs on the ground where the player is standing
  3. Perform player bending over animation
  4. Delete logs on the ground
  5. Replace it with a fire object
  6. Add experience for the player
  7. Check if the player can move east
    7.1 If so, move the player

Read full topic

item.title: 317 delta help
item.dc:creator: @DaGleesh DaGleesh
item.description:
@DaGleesh wrote:

zyle1992:

This is the help section. Not the spoonfeeding section. If you would like to know how to create these things, or if you have existing code, and want to know what changes need to be made to achieve the desired results, you can post that instead. But we’re not going to give you all of the code for all of the things you request. You don’t learn anything, we waste our time.

Can you HELP me find where to look for these things that need to be fixed? I would love to learn how to fix these things, if someone could teach me that would be lovely…

Read full topic
